title: Coronavirus: The Future Of Universities
description: What will universities and colleges look like post-coronavirus? Will the entire industry be disrupted by online learning, will state schools go bankrupt, will elite universities be effected at all? On this episode, Luigi and Kate give their expert analysis as both economists and professors about the future of higher education.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
